trans-unit.source: Accept multiple NtryDtls nodes in CAMTDocument
trans-unit.target: 接受CAMTDocument中的多个NtryDtls节点。

trans-unit.source: Added EbicsClient context manager (auto-confirm)
trans-unit.target: 添加了EbicsClient上下文管理器(自动确认)

trans-unit.source: Added EbicsClient property suppress_no_data_error
trans-unit.target: 添加了EbicsClient属性suppress_no_data_error。

trans-unit.source: Added FreeBSD binary
trans-unit.target: 新增FreeBSD二进制文件

trans-unit.source: Added a CAMT parser.
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个CAMT解析器。

trans-unit.source: Added a French and English version of the INI-letter.
trans-unit.target: 增加了INI字母的法文和英文版本。

trans-unit.source: Added a check for DigestMethod algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对DigestMethod算法的检查。

trans-unit.source: Added a check of remote SSL certificates against trusted CAs.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对远程SSL证书与可信CA的检查。

trans-unit.source: Added a check of the unicode variant (UCS2, UCS4) to setup.py.
trans-unit.target: 在setup.py中添加了对unicode变体(UCS2、UCS4)的检查。

trans-unit.source: Added a check to recognize transaction duplicates.
trans-unit.target: 添加了一项检查,以识别交易重复。

trans-unit.source: Added a dictionary of possible return codes to the SEPA module.
trans-unit.target: 为SEPA模块添加了一个可能的返回代码字典。

trans-unit.source: Added a much faster PBKDF2 implementation.
trans-unit.target: 增加了一个更快的PBKDF2实现。

trans-unit.source: Added a test to check DATEV parameters for invalid arguments.
trans-unit.target: 添加了一个检查DATEV参数是否无效的测试。

trans-unit.source: Added basic support for EBICS protocol version 2.4 (H003).
trans-unit.target: 增加了对EBICS协议2.4版本的基本支持(H003)。

trans-unit.source: Added creditor id to InitgPty/OrgId for Spanish banks.
trans-unit.target: 在InitgPty/OrgId中添加了西班牙银行的债权人ID。

trans-unit.source: Added currency of local account to SEPA documents
trans-unit.target: 在《安排》文件中增加了当地账户货币

trans-unit.source: Added further support for SEPA structured references.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对国家环保总局结构化引用的进一步支持。

trans-unit.source: Added method LicenseManager.list_ebics_users()
trans-unit.target: 新增方法LicenseManager.list_ebics_users()

trans-unit.source: Added new Amount class with an integrated currency converter.
trans-unit.target: 添加了新的金额类,并集成了货币转换器。

trans-unit.source: Added new DATEV module.
trans-unit.target: 添加了新的DATEV模块。

trans-unit.source: Added possibility to disable EBICS response verification.
trans-unit.target: 增加了禁用EBICS响应验证的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Added possibility to process single transactions in its own batch.
trans-unit.target: 增加了在自己的批次中处理单笔交易的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Added postal address to SEPA documents.
trans-unit.target: 在国家环保总局文件中增加了邮政地址。

trans-unit.source: Added silent parameter to method EbicsBank.activate_keys.
trans-unit.target: 为EbicsBank.activate_keys方法添加了沉默参数。

trans-unit.source: Added some IBAN countries
trans-unit.target: 增加了一些IBAN国家

trans-unit.source: Added some functionality based on the SCL Directory, published by the German Central Bank.
trans-unit.target: 在德国中央银行发布的SCL目录的基础上增加了一些功能。

trans-unit.source: Added some logging
trans-unit.target: 添加了一些日志

trans-unit.source: Added some tolerance to the MT940 parser and collect unknown structured fields.
trans-unit.target: 对MT940解析器增加了一些容忍度,并收集未知结构字段。

trans-unit.source: Added support for EBICS uploads that are approved manually via accompanying document.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对通过随附文件手动批准的EBICS上传的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added support for Python 3.8
trans-unit.target: 增加了对Python 3.8的支持

trans-unit.source: Added support for certificates.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对证书的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added support for creditor reference numbers.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对债权人参考号的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added support for distributed signatures (HVU, HVD, HVZ, HVT, HVE, HVS).
trans-unit.target: 增加了对分布式签名(HVU、HVD、HVZ、HVT、HVE、HVS)的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added support for other currencies in addition to EUR.
trans-unit.target: 增加了对除欧元以外的其他货币的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added support for the cryptography package in addition to PyCrypto.
trans-unit.target: 除了PyCrypto之外,还增加了对密码学包的支持。

trans-unit.source: Added the SEPA fields BREF, RREF, SQTP and RTCD to the MT940 parser.
trans-unit.target: 在MT940解析器中添加了SEPA字段BREF、RREF、SQTP和RTCD。

trans-unit.source: Added the attributes reference_id and sequence_id to the CAMTDocument parser.
trans-unit.target: 在 CAMTDocument 解析器中添加了 reference_id 和 sequence_id 属性。

trans-unit.source: Added the fields sum_credits and sum_debits to the MT942 parser.
trans-unit.target: 将字段sum_credits和sum_debits添加到MT942解析器。

trans-unit.source: Added the order types FUL and FDL.
trans-unit.target: 增加了订单类型FUL和FDL。

trans-unit.source: Added the order types PUB, HCA, HCS and H3K.
trans-unit.target: 增加了订单类型PUB、HCA、HCS和H3K。

trans-unit.source: Added the originator id to SEPA documents in GB and IE.
trans-unit.target: 在GB和IE中增加了SEPA文件的发起人ID。

trans-unit.source: Added the possibility to dynamically license additional EBICS users.
trans-unit.target: 增加了动态许可其他EBICS用户的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Added the possibility to specify custom order parameters for FDL/FUL.
trans-unit.target: 增加了为FDL/FUL指定自定义订单参数的可能性。

trans-unit.source: Added timeout to EBICS requests.
trans-unit.target: 增加了EBICS请求的超时。

trans-unit.source: All modules can be used free of charge. Only the unlicensed version of the EBICS module has few restrictions. The upload of SEPA documents is limited to a maximum of five transactions and bank account statements can not be retrieved for the last three days.
trans-unit.target: 所有模块都可以免费使用。只有EBICS模块的非许可版本有一些限制。上载的SEPA文件最多只能有五笔交易,而且不能检索最近三天的银行账户报表。

trans-unit.source: Automatic calculation of the lead time based on holidays and cut-off times
trans-unit.target: 根据节假日和截止时间自动计算交货时间。

trans-unit.source: Bankcode/Account to IBAN converter according to the rules of the German Central Bank
trans-unit.target: 根据德国中央银行的规定,将银行代码/账户转换为IBAN。

trans-unit.source: Changed LicenseManager endpoint
trans-unit.target: 更改了LicenseManager端点

trans-unit.source: Changed some attributes of SEPATransaction instances to be conform with the new CAMT parser:
trans-unit.target: 修改了SEPATransaction实例的一些属性,使其符合新的CAMT解析器。

trans-unit.source: Changed the API of SEPACreditTransfer and SEPADirectDebit to be more consistent and added support for different PAIN scheme versions.
trans-unit.target: 将SEPACreditTransfer和SEPADirectDebit的API更改为更加一致，并增加了对不同PAIN方案版本的支持。

trans-unit.source: Changed the behaviour of the flag parsed of some methods. Now a structure of dictionaries is returned instead of an objectified XML object.
trans-unit.target: 更改了某些方法分析的标志的行为。现在，返回的是字典结构，而不是对象化的XML对象。

trans-unit.source: Changed the expected type of the params parameter. Now it must be a dictionary instead of a list of tuples.
trans-unit.target: 更改了params参数的预期类型。现在它必须是字典，而不是元组列表。

trans-unit.source: Changed the order of the (BANKCODE, ACCOUNT) tuple to (ACCOUNT, BANKCODE) used by the Account initializer.
trans-unit.target: 将账户初始化器使用的(BANKCODE,ACCOUNT)元组的顺序改为(ACCOUNT,BANKCODE)。

trans-unit.source: Changed the property amout, now debits are signed negative.
trans-unit.target: 更改了属性amout，现在借方被签名为负。

trans-unit.source: Changed the property purpose, now it is a tuple of strings.
trans-unit.target: 更改了属性用途，现在它是字符串的元组。

trans-unit.source: Changelog
trans-unit.target: 变更日志

trans-unit.source: Correctly sign amounts if reversal flag is set (MT940 parser).
trans-unit.target: 如果反转标志被设置,则正确签署金额(MT940解析器)。

trans-unit.source: Create and submit SEPA credit transfers (pain.001)
trans-unit.target: 建立和提交《安排》信贷转移(pain.001)

trans-unit.source: Create and submit SEPA direct debits CORE/B2B (pain.008)
trans-unit.target: 建立并提交《国家环保总局》直接借记CORE/B2B(pain.008)

trans-unit.source: Created a more tolerant MT940 parser.
trans-unit.target: 创建了一个更加宽容的MT940解析器。

trans-unit.source: Currency converter
trans-unit.target: 货币转换器

trans-unit.source: DATEV converter (CSV and KNE)
trans-unit.target: DATEV转换器(CSV和KNE)

trans-unit.source: DATEV: Added DatevCSV format.
trans-unit.target: DATEV:增加了DatevCSV格式。

trans-unit.source: DATEV: Added DatevCSV version 710.
trans-unit.target: DATEV:增加了DatevCSV 710版。

trans-unit.source: DATEV: Added support for divergent financial years.
trans-unit.target: DATEV:增加了对不同财政年度的支持。

trans-unit.source: Disabled output of license due to some difficulties with pip
trans-unit.target: 由于在使用pip时遇到了一些困难,所以禁用了许可证的输出。

trans-unit.source: EBICS
trans-unit.target: EBICS

trans-unit.source: EBICS: API changes: Renamed first parameter of EbicsClient.HVU() and EbicsClient.HVZ() from “ordertypes” to “filter”.
trans-unit.target: EBICS：API更改：将EbicsClient.HVU（）和EbicsClient.HVZ（）的第一个参数从“订单类型”重命名为“过滤器”。

trans-unit.source: EBICS: Added support for external signatures.
trans-unit.target: EBICS。增加了对外部签名的支持。

trans-unit.source: EBICS: Dropped support for PyCrypto.
trans-unit.target: EBICS.放弃了对PyCrypto的支持。取消了对PyCrypto的支持。

trans-unit.source: EBICS: Fixed bug downloading large files
trans-unit.target: EBICS:修正了下载大文件的错误

trans-unit.source: EBICS: Fixed issue with self-signed certificates
trans-unit.target: EBICS。修正了自签证书的问题

trans-unit.source: EBICS: Implemented EBICS protocol version 3.0 (H005).
trans-unit.target: EBICS。已执行EBICS协议3.0版(H005)。

trans-unit.source: EBICS: Removed depreciated factory function EbicsClientCompat.
trans-unit.target: EBICS。删除了折旧的工厂功能EbicsClientCompat。

trans-unit.source: Examples
trans-unit.target: 例子

trans-unit.source: Features
trans-unit.target: 特点

trans-unit.source: First public release.
trans-unit.target: 第一次公开发行。

trans-unit.source: Fixed Distributed Signature bug with key version A006.
trans-unit.target: 修正了A006版密钥的分布式签名错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed VEU bug with suppress_no_data_error=True
trans-unit.target: 修正了VEU在suppress_no_data_error=True时的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a SEPA date issue.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个SEPA日期问题。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug handling XML namespaces.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个处理 XML 命名空间的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug handling bank keys with a small bit-length.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个处理小比特长度的银行键的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug in EbicsUser.create_ini_letter to correctly return bytes.
trans-unit.target: 修正了EbicsUser.create_ini_letter中的一个错误,使其正确返回字节。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug in some EBICS requests (missing parameter tag).
trans-unit.target: 修正了一些EBICS请求中的一个错误(缺少参数标签)。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug in the MT940 parser.
trans-unit.target: 修正了 MT940 解析器中的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug in the XML to dictionary converter.
trans-unit.target: 修正了XML转字典转换器中的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug in the path handler of the EbicsKeyRing class.
trans-unit.target: 修正了EbicsKeyRing类的路径处理程序中的一个错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug of Account.set_mandate with named arguments.
trans-unit.target: 修正了Account.set_mandate的一个带命名参数的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug parsing CAMT52 documents.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个解析CAMT52文档的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug refusing valid creditor ids.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个拒绝有效债权人ID的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug rejecting mandates signed more than three years ago.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个拒绝三年前签署的授权的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug swapping local and remote account for returned transactions by the CAMT parser.
trans-unit.target: 修正了CAMT解析器返回的交易中本地和远程账户互换的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a bug throwing an exception in an unregistered version of PyEBICS.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个在未注册的PyEBICS版本中抛出异常的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a distributed signature bug.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一个分布式签名的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a few minor bugs.
trans-unit.target: 修正了一些小错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a problem with Python builts compiled without “–with-fpectl”.
trans-unit.target: 修复了在没有“ –with-fpectl”的情况下编译的Python构建的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fixed a problem with the exception handling in IPython.
trans-unit.target: 修正了IPython中异常处理的问题。

trans-unit.source: Fixed an encoding bug of non-ascii error messages under Python 2.
trans-unit.target: 修正了Python 2下非ascii错误信息的编码错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed an issue with IPython and Django
trans-unit.target: 修正了IPython和Django的一个问题。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug of wrong OrderParams tag used by orders of the distributed signature.
trans-unit.target: 修复了分布式签名的订单使用的OrderParams标签错误的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug of wrong content type in EBICS module.
trans-unit.target: 修正了EBICS模块中内容类型错误的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed bug using a proxy.
trans-unit.target: 修正了使用代理的错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed creditor/debtor assignment of reversed transactions (CAMTParser).
trans-unit.target: 逆转交易的固定债权人/债务人转让(CAMTParser);

trans-unit.source: Fixed debugging issues
trans-unit.target: 修正了调试问题

trans-unit.source: Fixed minor bug in mt940 parser.
trans-unit.target: 修正了mt940解析器的小错误。

trans-unit.source: Fixed some bugs regarding the distributed signature
trans-unit.target: 修正了一些关于分布式签名的错误

trans-unit.source: Fixed the broken functionality of distributed signatures.
trans-unit.target: 修正了分布式签名的破损功能。

trans-unit.source: Fixed the handling of invalid dates (eg. 2015-02-30) in MT940 and CAMT parsers.
trans-unit.target: 修正了MT940和CAMT解析器中对无效日期的处理(例如:2015-02-30)。

trans-unit.source: Fixed the handling of invalid times (24:00:00) in CAMT documents.
trans-unit.target: 修正了CAMT文件中无效时间(24:00:00)的处理。

trans-unit.source: Fixed unverified SSL connections (Py>=2.7.9)
trans-unit.target: 修复了未经验证的SSL连接（Py> = 2.7.9）

trans-unit.source: Fixed wrong XML position of UltmtCdtr node in SEPA documents.
trans-unit.target: 修正了SEPA文件中UltmtCdtr节点的XML位置错误。

trans-unit.source: Integrated mandate manager (beta)
trans-unit.target: 综合任务管理人(贝塔)

trans-unit.source: MT940 parser: Accept all characters in purpose text even if defined as delimiter.
trans-unit.target: MT940解析器。接受目的文本中的所有字符,即使定义为定界符。

trans-unit.source: Made BIC optional for SEPA transactions.
trans-unit.target: 使工商局的交易成为《安排》交易的备选方案。

trans-unit.source: Made the BIC optional for national transactions.
trans-unit.target: 使得国家交易可以选择使用工商局代码。

trans-unit.source: Made the library Python 2/3 compatible.
trans-unit.target: 使该库与Python 2/3兼容。

trans-unit.source: Made the package available for Windows.
trans-unit.target: 为Windows提供了软件包。

trans-unit.source: Made the user for EbicsClient optional.
trans-unit.target: 让EbicsClient的用户成为可选项。

trans-unit.source: Minor bug fix creating self-signed certificates.
trans-unit.target: 创建自签证书的小错误修复。

trans-unit.source: Minor bug fix of the module loader.
trans-unit.target: 模块加载器的小错误修复。

trans-unit.source: Minor bug fix parsing MT942 documents.
trans-unit.target: 对MT942文档解析的小错误修复。

trans-unit.source: Mostly full SEPA support (including special schemes for CH and IT)
trans-unit.target: 主要是国家环保总局的全面支持(包括针对社区卫生和信息技术的专项计划)

trans-unit.source: NEW: Account.set_mandate(mref, signed, recurrent)
trans-unit.target: NEW:Account.set_mandate(mref,signed,recurrent)

trans-unit.source: NEW: SEPADirectDebit(account, ‘CORE’, …)
trans-unit.target: 新：SEPADirectDebit（帐户，“ CORE”，...）

trans-unit.source: New packaging
trans-unit.target: 新包装

trans-unit.source: Now parses the transaction classification also for DK in addition to ZKA.
trans-unit.target: 现在除了ZKA之外,还对DK的交易分类进行解析。

trans-unit.source: Now the SEPATransaction property amount is of type Amount.
trans-unit.target: 现在，SEPATransaction属性的金额为Amount类型。

trans-unit.source: OLD: Account.set_mandate(mref, signed, first, last)
trans-unit.target: 旧的:Account.set_mandate(mref,signed,first,last)

trans-unit.source: OLD: SEPADirectDebit(account, ‘COR1’, …)
trans-unit.target: OLD：SEPADirectDebit（帐户，“ COR1”，...）

trans-unit.source: Obtain bank account statements (incl. CAMT and MT940 parser)
trans-unit.target: 获取银行账户报表(包括CAMT和MT940解析器)

trans-unit.source: Old versions should be uninstalled before upgrading!
trans-unit.target: 旧版本应先卸载再升级!

trans-unit.source: Plausibility check of IBAN and BIC
trans-unit.target: IBAN和BIC的可信度检查

trans-unit.source: PyOpenSSL is not longer required to support certificates.
trans-unit.target: PyOpenSSL不再需要支持证书。

trans-unit.source: Removed direct debit type COR1 and adjusted mandate sequence types. API changes:
trans-unit.target: 删除了直接借记类型COR1,调整了任务序列类型。API变化。

trans-unit.source: Removed the property account, instead use the method get_account().
trans-unit.target: 删除了属性帐户，而是使用方法get_account（）。

trans-unit.source: Removed the property id.
trans-unit.target: 删除了属性ID。

trans-unit.source: Renamed the package from ebics to fintech and the module client to ebics.
trans-unit.target: 将软件包从ebics重命名为fintech，并将模块客户端重命名为 ebics。

trans-unit.source: Renamed the property due_date to date.
trans-unit.target: 把其更名为DUE_DATE到日期。

trans-unit.source: Renamed the property ext_purpose to purpose_code.
trans-unit.target: 将属性ext_purpose重命名为Purpose_code。

trans-unit.source: Replaced the possibility to separate transactions with a method to create new batches.
trans-unit.target: 用创建新批次的方法取代了分开交易的可能性。

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Added CBI schema for Italy
trans-unit.target: 《国家环保总局》。增加了意大利的CBI模式

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Added Swiss scheme versions.
trans-unit.target: 《国家环保总局》。增加了瑞士方案版本。

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Added method Account.is_sepa()
trans-unit.target: SEPA。增加了方法Account.is_sepa()

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Added method Account.set_originator_id()
trans-unit.target: SEPA。增加了方法Account.set_originator_id()

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Added support for Instant Payments
trans-unit.target: SEPA。增加对即时支付的支持

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Added unstructured address attribute to Account.
trans-unit.target: 《安排》。为账户添加了非结构化地址属性。

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Fixed bug in CBI scheme (CBI unique code)
trans-unit.target: 《安排》。修正了社区投资计划中的错误(社区投资独特代码)

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Fixed bug in CBI schemes
trans-unit.target: 《安排》。修正了社区投资计划中的错误

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Fixed bug in Swiss SCT scheme versions
trans-unit.target: SEPA。修正了瑞士SCT计划版本中的错误

trans-unit.source: SEPA: Updated IBAN countries.
trans-unit.target: 《安排》。更新的IBAN国家。

trans-unit.source: Several bug fixes.
trans-unit.target: Diverse correzioni di bug.

trans-unit.source: Simple SEPA Credit Transfer (pain.001)
trans-unit.target: 简单的《安排》信贷转移(pain.001)

trans-unit.source: Simple SEPA Direct Debit (pain.008)
trans-unit.target: 简单的《安排》直接付款(面包.008)

trans-unit.source: Some code improvements
trans-unit.target: 一些代码改进

trans-unit.source: Some code improvements and minor bug fixes.
trans-unit.target: 一些代码改进和小的bug修复。

trans-unit.source: Splitted the functionality of the class EbicsClient into the classes EbicsClient, EbicsBank, EbicsUser and EbicsKeyRing. Added the new class factory EbicsClientCompat for backwards compatibility.
trans-unit.target: 将EbicsClient类的功能拆分为 EbicsClient，EbicsBank，EbicsUser和EbicsKeyRing类。添加了新的类工厂EbicsClientCompat，以实现向后兼容。

trans-unit.source: Support of EBICS versions 2.4, 2.5 and 3.0
trans-unit.target: 支持EBICS 2.4、2.5和3.0版本。

trans-unit.source: The FinTech package provides you the possibility to manage all of your everyday commercial banking activities such as credit transfers, direct debits or the retrieval of bank account statements in a flexible and secure manner.
trans-unit.target: 金融科技套餐为您提供了管理所有日常商业银行活动的可能性,如信贷转账、直接扣款或以灵活和安全的方式检索银行账户报表。

trans-unit.source: The Python FinTech package (SEPA, EBICS & more)
trans-unit.target: Python FinTech软件包（SEPA，EBICS等）

trans-unit.source: This package contains all the functionality that is required to work with EBICS, SEPA and other financial technologies. The usage has been realised as simple as possible but also as flexible as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 该软件包包含了与EBICS、SEPA和其他金融技术合作所需的所有功能。它的使用尽可能简单,但也尽可能灵活。

trans-unit.source: Updated External Code Sets
trans-unit.target: 更新的外部代码集

trans-unit.source: Use INI letter path with user’s home directory expanded.
trans-unit.target: 使用INI字母路径并扩展用户的主目录。

trans-unit.source: Validation of payment orders against the SEPA Clearing Directory of the German Central Bank
trans-unit.target: 根据德国中央银行的《国家环保总局清算目录》验证支付指令。
